title: Paul in Romans Works to Address the Great Puzzle of Decay and Glory
description:
We're restarting the Romans class for Adult Sunday School at Living Stones.  Here after an Omicron hiatus we're getting ready to address Romans 1:18-19

You can follow live in Sundays at https://www.youtube.com/c/LivingStonesChristianReformedSacramento
